title: Successful appointment booking with single service
description: Verify that a customer can successfully book an appointment by selecting one service, a barber, and an available time slot.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking page
Select a single service from the service list
Select a barber from the barber list
Pick a future date and choose an available time slot
Confirm the booking
Verify the booking is confirmed and a WhatsApp notification is sent to the customer

title: Successful appointment booking with multiple services
description: Ensure the system allows booking an appointment with multiple services selected for the same time slot and barber.

steps.description: Open the booking page
Select multiple services from the available list
Choose a barber
Select an available date and time slot
Complete the booking confirmation
Verify the booking is confirmed with the selected multiple services and notification sent

title: Booking failure for unavailable time slot
description: Verify that the system prevents booking an appointment when the selected time slot is no longer available.

steps.description: Navigate to booking page
Select service and barber
Attempt to select a time slot that is fully booked or blocked
Try to confirm the booking
Verify the booking is rejected and an appropriate error message is displayed

title: POS system sale transaction with appointment payment
description: Verify that the POS system correctly processes a sale linked to a previously booked appointment, including receipt generation and cash flow update.

steps.description: Open POS interface
Retrieve an existing booked appointment
Process payment for the appointment with a supported payment method
Generate thermal receipt
Confirm receipt is accurately generated and daily cash flow is updated

title: POS system sale transaction with walk-in customer
description: Test the POS system can process a sale for a walk-in customer without a prior booking and update records accordingly.

steps.description: Access POS page
Input service selection and customer details for walk-in
Complete payment using a valid payment method
Trigger receipt printing
Verify transaction is successful, receipt generated, and cash flow updated

title: POS system handles unsupported payment method gracefully
description: Ensure the POS system displays a proper error message when a user attempts to pay using an unsupported payment method.

steps.description: Open POS interface
Process a sale payment using an unsupported payment method
Verify an error message is shown and payment is not accepted

title: Staff check-in with valid GPS location
description: Confirm that barbers can check in to their shifts successfully only when their GPS location is validated to be within the shop vicinity.

steps.description: Open staff attendance check-in mobile interface
Enable GPS and simulate device location within the shop
Initiate check-in
Check attendance record is created and marked as valid

title: Staff check-in denied with invalid GPS location
description: Verify that the system prevents staff from checking in when their GPS location is outside the allowed shop area.

steps.description: Open attendance check-in page on staff smartphone
Set GPS location outside the barber shop vicinity
Attempt to check in
Verify check-in is rejected with an appropriate error message

title: Admin dashboard displays real-time sales data
description: Ensure that the admin dashboard shows up-to-date, accurate sales information for the current day and selectable historical periods.

steps.description: Log into admin dashboard
Navigate to the sales analytics tab
Verify real-time sales data and daily totals are displayed correctly and match transactional records
Select a past date range
Confirm historical sales data is loaded and accurate

title: Admin dashboard allows managing services and pricing
description: Verify administrators can add, edit, and remove services and adjust their prices through the admin dashboard interface.

steps.description: Access the service management section in admin dashboard
Add a new service with valid details and pricing
Confirm new service appears in the service list with correct pricing
Modify an existing service's price
Verify the updated price is saved and displayed
Delete a service
Check the service is removed from the list

title: Admin can schedule staff shifts and holidays
description: Test that the admin dashboard enables scheduling of staff shifts and marking holidays correctly, reflecting in staff attendance and booking availability.

steps.description: Log into the admin dashboard
Navigate to staff scheduling and holiday management
Create or modify a staff shift schedule
Verify changes are saved and visible in staff schedules
Mark specific dates as holidays
Check holidays are reflected and no bookings can occur on these dates

title: Admin dashboard generates accurate financial reports
description: Confirm that financial reports generated in the admin dashboard correctly summarize sales, cash flows, and commissions.

steps.description: Log into admin dashboard
Access financial reporting section
Generate reports for daily, weekly, and monthly periods
Verify detailed financial data including total sales, cash flow, and commissions are accurate and consistent with the POS data

title: AI assistant correctly processes booking requests
description: Verify the AI assistant understands and processes customer booking requests accurately, confirming appointments via conversational interface.

steps.description: Invoke AI assistant chat interface
Request a booking by specifying service, barber, date, and time
AI assistant confirms the booking details and submits the appointment correctly

title: AI assistant returns correct info for common inquiries
description: Ensure the AI assistant responds appropriately with accurate information when asked common questions about shop services and policies.

steps.description: Interact with AI assistant
Ask predefined FAQs about shop hours, cancellation policies, and service descriptions
Verify AI assistant provides accurate and relevant answers

title: OneSignal push notification sent on successful booking
description: Validate that push notifications are reliably sent via OneSignal to customers and barbers immediately after a successful booking confirmation.

steps.description: Complete a new booking
Verify both the customer and chosen barber receive timely push notifications about the appointment

title: Push notification delivery failure handling
description: Test the system behavior when OneSignal push notification delivery fails, ensuring that errors are logged and retries or fallbacks occur.

steps.description: Simulate failure in sending push notification via OneSignal
Verify the failure is logged and retry mechanism is triggered or an alternative notification method is initiated
